name: HD Poker
description:
HD Poker is the most exciting free online poker game anywhere! Compete in Texas Hold'em vs. players around the world on up to four tables in stunning High Definition.

Features include:

  • Poker Skill Rating Leaderboard - compete and earn Weekly Leaderboard Rewards!
  • Unique PSR system that analyzes your skill and reflects your true Texas Hold'em talent.
  • Gorgeous graphics and hand drawn art.
  • Collect your FREE Streak Bonus every 4 hours!
  • Play on 9-handed, 5-handed or Turbo Tables.
  • Buddy lists so you can easily play with or message friends.
  • Achievements with rewards you can earn by playing – try to collect them all!
  • Detailed and immersive poker rooms.
  • Send gifts to other players – buy drinks for the table or cheer up a friend.
  • From Cowboys to Grannies, choose your Avatar and show off your best poker face!
  • Open special Chests that contain awesome, rare items.
  • Multi platform - play HD Poker with friends on Steam, mobile (iOS/Android), and the web!

Get started - play for free today!
